about_the_game:
Chibi Escape is an asymmetric multiplayer survival game, full of action, team play, horror and, of course, fun.

You wake up on an abandoned map in a company of few more unfortunate chibies like you. Scared, without any memories... Hopefully, you are not alone. Collaborate with others to find keys to open your way out.

- “Wait, did you hear that?”
- “Why am I that scared?”
- ”Jesus Christ, he`s gonna kill us. RUN!”



Nothing is that easy. Unfortunately, there is also a person, chosen by the curse. His main priority is to kill as much of you as he can, to fulfill Curse`s will.

Key features:
- Different in-game locations. Each round you will be spawned on one from a few different maps. The only similar goal is to find required amount of keys and escape the map through the gates… alive.
- Survive together … or not? You can collaborate with other survivors to escape all together. You can revive fallen Chibies, hinder killer from damaging survivors as a ghost. Or, you can betray your fallen teammates and escape alone… if you can.
- Fight for your survival or lose a part of your mind. Kill as many survivors as you can to prevent losing a piece of your consciousness, turning you into emotionless, empty chibi without any feeling or thoughts, knows as the Bots.



Do whatever you can to survive, but remember. The main PRIORITY for your IS YOURSELF!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Long ago, you were cursed. Now you have to fight for your life by either killing hopeless Chibies, or by trying to escape the map. Loot chests, hide from the Killer, use special abilities, collaborate with others, betray them. Do everything to escape from the map alive.
